alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 1:11PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Big Horn and northwestern Sheridan Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 111 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northeast of Medicine Wheel, or 37 miles northeast of Lovell, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lodge Grass, Wyola and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southern Big Horn
